holidays.title: Harry Potter Birthday
holidays.description: Pack your wand and hop on your broomstick!

holidays.title: Hawaii Flag day
holidays.description: It's all about celebrating the flag of Hawaii on Hawaii Flag Day.

holidays.title: Lifeguard Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Enjoy peace of mind as you take a dip knowing that lifeguards are nearby.

holidays.title: Martyrdom Day of Shaheed Udham Singh
holidays.description: Let us remember the life story of Shaheed Udham Singh and the massacre of Amritsar.

holidays.title: National Avocado Day
holidays.description: “The avocado is a food without rival among the fruits, the veritable fruit of paradise.”

holidays.title: National Jump for Jelly Beans Day
holidays.description: Jump for joy, this National Jump for Jelly Beans Day, and enjoy a bowl full of them.

holidays.title: National Raspberry Cake Day
holidays.description: Raspberries infuse this cake with a unique flavor, elevating it to another level entirely.

holidays.title: Shredded Wheat Day
holidays.description: Enjoy a healthy breakfast of 100% whole wheat biscuits to remain energized throughout the day.

holidays.title: Uncommon Instrument Awareness Day
holidays.description: This unusual holiday encourages everyone to learn about and try a new and unusual musical instrument.

holidays.title: World Ranger Day
holidays.description: We pay tribute to the unsung heroes who protect, preserve, and defend America’s dwindling wilderness.

holidays.title: J.K. Rowling’s Birthday
holidays.description: This is one successful and strong woman who is inspiring young women around the world!

holidays.title: Lil Uzi Vert’s Birthday
holidays.description: This well-known rapper and songwriter is one of the most powerful artists in the music industry.

holidays.title: Mark Cuban’s Birthday
holidays.description: This prominent businessman and entrepreneur built his empire from the ground up.
